questions.question_text: Aksharam-aham ityevam bhaktyā prasanna chetasā | Purushottama dāso'smi mantram etam ___________ || 57 ||
questions.explanation: The shlok states: Aksharam-aham ityevam bhaktyā prasanna chetasā | Purushottama dāso'smi mantram etam vadech-chhuchim || 57 ||

questions.question_text: je brahmarūp thayo tene ja Purushottamnī bhaktino adhikār chhe.
questions.explanation: This quote is directly from Vachanamrut Loya 7.

questions.question_text: Harir Brahma-gurush-chaiva bhavato ____________ | Tayor eva hi kartavyam dhyānam mānasa-pūjanam || 59 ||
questions.explanation: The shlok states: Harir Brahma-gurush-chaiva bhavato moksha-dāyakau | Tayor eva hi kartavyam dhyānam mānasa-pūjanam || 59 ||

questions.question_text: Bhagwān ne Bhagwānnā sant e ja kalyāņkārī chhe... Bhagwān ke Bhagwānnā santnī jyāre prāpti thaï tyāre e jīvne ethī uparānt bīju koī kalyāņ nathī, e ja param kalyān chhe.
questions.explanation: This quote is directly from Vachanamrut Gadhada Madhya 59.
The shlok states: Kuryāch-cha mānasīm pūjām shānta ekāgra chetasā || 58 ||

questions.question_text: Sant hu ne hu te vaļi sant re, Em Shrimukhe kahe Bhagwant re; Sant mānajo māri murati re, Emā fer nathi ek rati re...
questions.explanation: This quote is directly from Purushottam Prakash 41/9.

questions.question_text: je Bhagwānnā pratāpne vichārīne ____________ kare chhe, te to potānā swarūpne atishay ujjval prakāshmān jue chhe ane te prakāshne madhye pratyaksh evā je Purushottam Bhagwān tenī mūrtine jue chhe
questions.explanation: The Vachanamrut states: je Bhagwānnā pratāpne vichārīne antardrashți kare chhe, te to potānā swarūpne atishay ujjval prakāshmān jue chhe ane te prakāshne madhye pratyaksh evā je Purushottam Bhagwān tenī mūrtine jue chhe

questions.question_text: Jem Bhagwānnī mānasī pūjā kare tem ja je uttam haribhakta hoy tenī pan Bhagwānnī prasādīe karīne Bhagwan bheļī mānasī pūjā kare...to te kanishth bhakta hoy ne te be janme tathā chār janme tathā das janme ke so janme karīne uttam bhakta jevo thanāro hoy, te āne janme karīne uttam bhakta thây chhe. Evu Bhagwān ne te Bhagwānnā bhakta tenī sarakhī sevā karyānu fal chhe.
questions.explanation: This quote is directly from Vachanamrut Vartal 5.

questions.question_text: Tatah pūjādhikārāya bhaktah satsangam āshritaha | Kuryād ātma-vichāram cha pratāpam ____________ || 56 ||
questions.explanation: The shlok states: Tatah pūjādhikārāya bhaktah satsangam āshritaha | Kuryād ātma-vichāram cha pratāpam chintayan harehe || 56 ||

questions.question_text: potānā jīvātmāne e brahma sangathe ekatā karīne Parabrahmanī Swāmī-sevakbhāve upāsanā karavī.
questions.explanation: This quote is directly from Vachanamrut Gadhada Madhya 3.
